Sentencas: This manuscript shows an over-view of the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology based on industrial developments.
Titulo: Directions of the industrial development of the solid oxide fuel cells technology

Sentencas: The information presentedhas been collected mostly at conferences that the authors attended.
Titulo: Directions of the industrial development of the solid oxide fuel cells technology

Sentencas: It is observed that several companies have been pursuing the development of the SOFC technology.
Titulo: Directions of the industrial development of the solid oxide fuel cells technology

Sentencas: Significant advances in stability and power density have raised the economic interest in this technology recently.
Titulo: Directions of the industrial development of the solid oxide fuel cells technology

Sentencas: It is revealed that the SOFC materials are essentially the same ones that have been used in the past decades.
Titulo: Directions of the industrial development of the solid oxide fuel cells technology

Sentencas: and that the two most important designs of pre-commercial SOFC prototypes are the tubular and planar ones.
Titulo: Directions of the industrial development of the solid oxide fuel cells technology
